title: Gorgeous Parks And Easy Shopping, Available Now! 61+
posting_body: Want more information on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 535 Sq.
Ballinger Court is pleased to offer affordable senior living (income restrictions apply).
Settle into comfortable living at Ballinger Court, an affordable senior apartment community offering 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans.
Ballinger Court is set in the desirable city of Edmonds, known for its thriving art scene and incredible scenery.
Well-designed floor plans offer the ideal space for entertaining or relaxing.
We’re just minutes from Lake Ballinger, offering abundant trails and endless beauty.
Or head to historic downtown Edmonds to wander through art galleries, take in a show at Edmonds Center of the Arts, or sample fresh northwest cuisine.
When it comes to convenience, we have you covered, too.
Grocery stores, pharmacies and Swedish Edmonds Hospital are all within easy reach.
Plus, convenient access to public transit, I-5, and WA-99 makes connecting to attractions and resources throughout greater Seattle a breeze.
- Carpeting in living rooms and bedrooms
- Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)
- Minutes to shopping, dining and healthcare
- Easy access to I-5 and WA-99
Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply).
Please visit our website for additional details.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
